remarks: The lattice translation of an atom not under the fiducial co-atom is also an atom not under the fiducial co-atom.  Remark below Lemma B in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 22-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnel.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnel.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ltrnel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnel.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnel $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) e. A /\ -. ( F ` P ) .<_ W ) ) $.
